divs: Sighting DetailsIN AND AROUND THE 5TH OF JANURARY 2010 I WAS A FLIGHT ATTENDENT ON A COMMERICAL FLIGHT APPROX I00 MILES SOUTH WEST OF ARKANSAS WHEN I WAS INSIDE THE COCKPIT TALKING WITH THE PILOT WHEN WE BOTH OBSERVED A BRIGHT OVAL OBJECT WHICH SENT A BEAM OF LIGHT TO THE GROUND, ON A ROUND OBJECT. THIS WAS SO AMAZING TO US AS THEY FOLLOWED OUR AIRCRAFT FOR APPROXIMATLY ONE HALF HOUR THEN SUDDENLY DISAPEARED. WE NEVER MADE A REPORT ABOUT THIS AS WE FEARED RETRABUTION FROM OUR SUPERIORS. THIS INFORMATION WAS SUPPLIED TO MUFON INVESTIGATOR WILLIAM STEPHENSON OF N.J. THE WITNESSES WANT TO REMAIN SECRET FOR PROFESSIONAL REASONS. THIS INFORMATIONM WAS RELETED TO MUFON INVESTIGATOR WILLIAM STEPHENSON ON WEDNESDAY 3-31-10 WHILE ON A FLIGHT TO PHIONEX, ARIZONIA
Summary: OBSERVED A CIRCLE BRIGHT OBJECT IN THE SKY WITH A BEAM PROTUDING TO THE EARTHY SURROUNDING A ROUND OBJECT BOTH FOLLOWED A COMMERCIAL AIR PLANE.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Little Rock
There were no other sightings in Little Rock on or around January 5th 2010
